msbt.message: Heyyy, ! It's your birthday! That means cake, candle and magazine-sourced life advice!Your candle only lasts so long, you know? Here now, but gone too soon. So, grab that vibe, hug it hard, andmake a wish! And make it for the fabbest future you can imagine! Then? Make that wish COME TRUE!BE who you need to be! DO what you need to do! BE HAPPY! Becausebefore you know ityour candle's going to burn all the way downAnd make your cake taste funny!It's time, ! Go to your cake! Make your wish! Press ! Start your journey to fabness!
Quick! Before the candles melt! Stand in front of the cake, and blow them out by pressing !
Blow out the candles with  to start your super fabulous, super special day, !
I wonder when folks started putting candles on cakes?I mean, who was it that said, "Cake is delicious and allbut what if it was also on fire?"
Your birthday was so much fun, ! I love hanging with my friends on their b-days!
Just seeing birthday-party decorations makes me SO EXCITED!
Happy birthday, ! I hope this next year is FABTASTIC for you, !
You're one year older than you were yesterday, !Just 364 more days until your next b-day party! Unless it's a leap year next year. I haven't really checked.

Did you know? We totally have the same birthday!Do folks with the same b-days think the same kinds of things?Or do we think—OHMIGOSH—the EXACT SAME things?! If we did, then you're thinking"I wonder if is thinking the same thing as me?"<10_4 /> If you are, then that's WEIRD, huh?
Today is MY birthday too! B-day twins!
When your birthday is on New Year's Day, it's totally a double celebration!
Leap-year birthdays are fab! You get four years' worth of celebration on one day!The next time there's a February 29th? We're going to have SO much fun!
Today's your birthday and it only happens once every four years, so we better go ALL OUT!I am, like, SO happy to be part of your big-time birthday party, !
Having a birthday on must be really easy to remember, !
I can't believe your birthday is today! I'm SO jealous!Also? I have SUCH a cupcake craving right now!
I am so jelly of you having your b-day landing when it does! It's like all the decorations are for you!
We all worked together to make this glamaaazing piñata!
I'm totes excited to see you break it open! Go for it, !
We all worked sooo hard to make this for you, !
